column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Impress Women With Your Apartment
#Text=A woman by nature will be curious about where you live and what activities/hobbies you are interested in .
#Text=Women tend to be detail oriented and very observant so impress her with a clean and interesting apartment or room .
#Text=Make the effort and it will reward you in countless ways by improving on your relationships with all the females in your life .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Start to deep clean every room .
#Text=What does that mean ?

#Text=Take the time to remove all trash and throw away , clear off furniture and dust , strip the bed of sheets and launder them , make the bed and change the towels , scrub your sink , shower and toilet .
#Text=Wash the floors and vacuum .
#Text=Wipe down the walls and counters with hot water and soap .
#Text=Windex the mirrors .
#Text=Toss the dirty laundry in a hamper in the closet .
#Text=Dust bookshelves .
#Text=The biggest turn off to many women is filth .
#Text=The room should look and smell fresh .
#Text=Toss the clutter .
#Text=Be alert to any funky smells-clean out the fridge .
#Text=Make it spotless .
#Text=Toss out any thing that smells bad .
#Text=If you have pets-really clean after them and remove any pet hair .
#Text=Write down five interests/hobbies/passions that appeal to you on a piece of paper .
#Text=Some examples are outdoor living , sports , bikes , books , boats , art , skiing , film , travel , wine , photography , music , cars , cooking and nature .
#Text=Buy some bookshelves and fill them with books on these different interests .
#Text=You do n't have to spend a fortune , go to a used bookstore or a library sale .
#Text=Books are an insight into who you are and a great conversation starter .
#Text=Add your CD and DVD collections to bookshelves but weed out any porn .
#Text=Include some romantic music and films .
#Text=Invest in some candles but do n't overdo it and make sure they have saucers underneath them .
#Text=Hang some pictures-black and white photos that are nicely framed are classic .
#Text=Try to avoid leaning them on the walls-actually hang them .
#Text=Get rid of naked women posters-its tacky .
#Text=Hang a poster or art that reflects your interests .
#Text=Cheap art can be found at local art shows .
#Text=Realize that the goal in decorating is to express who you are but avoid the " one theme " rooms .
#Text=They can be corny .
#Text=Also try to pare down on excessive collections .
#Text=If you have 5,000 comic books-pick a few and box up the rest .
#Text=Try to show varied interests .
#Text=Reflect your growing mind and hobbies .
#Text=If you always wanted to go to Italy or ski on the Alps .
#Text=Get books on Italy or posters of the Alps to remind you to keep the dream alive .
#Text=It is very romantic to see a man 's future plans .
#Text=Avoid leaving sexual items around .
#Text=She knows you like sex , so you do n't have to prove to her you are a stud .
#Text=It makes you look like an idiot and too eager .
#Text=Throw away any ex-girlfriend 's pictures or items .
#Text=Toss the ratty towels and invest in some good cotton ones .
#Text=Always have toilet paper and Kleenex on hand .
#Text=Stock that clean fridge with water , diet coke and wine not just beer .
#Text=Have some fresh fruit and bread on the counter .
#Text=Invest in a coffee maker and coffee bean grinder .
#Text=Have milk and sugar in fridge for coffee .
#Text=Understand that your apartment is a reflection of who you are as a person .
#Text=Do n't let your date get bored because you have nothing interesting to look at or talk about .
#Text=Also keep your place updated , do n't keep old magazines and newspapers-buy new ones and change things around from time to time .
#Text=Tips
#Text=If you have a fireplace-keep it clean and ready to use .
#Text=Try to make her feel as comfortable as possible .
#Text=Offer her a drink and take her coat .
#Text=In the bathroom-keep spare toothbrushes and new toothpaste .
#Text=Have both shampoo and conditioner in the shower .
#Text=In the kitchen-have napkins and clean glasses for both drinking and wine .
#Text=If she wants a beer-pour it in a glass .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Turn down your answering machine volume and turn off the cell phone if possible .
#Text=Do n't keep checking your phone or computer .
#Text=It is rude .
#Text=Do n't clean or sweep in front of her when she arrives .
#Text=Focus your attention on her .
#Text=If she seems anxious to leave than take her to dinner or a movie .
#Text=Most women avoid unflattering lighting .
#Text=Try to place softer lighting in bedroom and living rooms .
#Text=Do n't blast her with music when she arrives-it is off putting .
#Text=Do n't keep a woman 's robe for " guests " .
#Text=It will make her feel like she is one of many .
#Text=When she arrives , offer to take her coat and hang it up .
#Text=Get her a drink and tell her to make herself at home .
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=Ajax , Windex , Lysol , sponges , dust rags and hot water .
#Text=Toilet cleaner and a vacuum .
#Text=A broom and mop .
#Text=Trash can
#Text=A comfortable couch and nice coffee table
#Text=3 or 4 lamps
#Text=books , art and photos
#Text=bookcases
#Text=a double bed with a good mattress , sheets , comforter , towels and soft pillows
#Text=coffee beans and a coffee grinder
#Text=drinking glasses , coffee mugs , a corkscrew and wine glasses
#Text=Assorted drinks
